title: The Secret Books of Paradys
description: The gothic genius of Lees great works of fantasy are finally available in onevolume. Witness the city of Paradyss life and history through the eyes of itsprovocative and perverse citizens, in this darkly fascinating odyssey as onlythe award-winning author could imagine it.Includes:The Book of the Damned (1988)The Book of the Beast (1988)The Book of the Dead (1991) (collection of short stories)The Book of the Mad (1993)
author: Tanith Lee
